item.title: build automation with xcode 4 dot 3 kif and jenkins
item.description: UPDATE: As pointed to me in this commment, sym links aren’t necessary for Waxsim anymore. Check Jonathan Penn’s fork on github. After coming back from my holidays in China - which were awesome - I had no downtime at ThoughtWorks and started at a brand new client/project - a much needed change from what I had been working on lately. It’s an iOS project, more specifically an iPad app and that’s pretty much all I can tell you about it.
